title: Humble Bitcoiners

content: Hi, i`m auctioning 2 x Kialara Exogenesis with #34 & #144 In this series there are no matching sets or suites cause there are only running numbers from 001 to 250. These 2 beauties are numbered as the small denominations with 2,000,000 sats (#144) & 5,000,000 sats (#34) Further information: https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2021-exogenesis/They are in mint condition, saved within plastic cases and a black sleeve & stored at the Miner Jones headquarter (thanks for taking the pics for me Escrow via Miner Jones. Escrow fee and shipping on buyers sideSTARTING BID: 0.14 Btc**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**Aution end: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20221009T16&p0=179&font=cursiveSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added from the time of that bid.High resolution pics:https://imgur.com/35q8gkKhttps://imgur.com/AIUkhDKhttps://imgur.com/jfSLRgnhttps://imgur.com/jD5gwlbhttps://imgur.com/kzb4yaNhttps://imgur.com/UrZSrEX
